name: nextjs15-toploader-page-transition-no-external-libs
author: Remco Stoeten
description: A toploader / page transition indicator acting just like the package  `nextjs-toploader`, `NProgress` or loading heavy liraries like `framer-motion`. In essence there is nothing wrong with those libraries but it does add another dependency, which is often not necessary *kuch* lodash *kuch*, or not allowed by the organization. And owning your code is often, not always, better.
